Trigger.name: Get Class
Trigger.script:
local primary = string.trim(matches[2]) local reborn = string.trim(matches[3])
xaos.class = { primary = primary ,reborn = reborn ,cleric = false ,mage = false ,warrior = false ,thief = false ,barbarian=false ,warcry=false }

local classtable = {} classtable = {"knight","berserker"} if table.contains(classtable,primary) or table.contains(classtable,reborn) then xaos.class.warcry = true end
classtable = {"cleric","bishop","monk","druid"} if table.contains(classtable,primary) or table.contains(classtable,reborn) then xaos.class.cleric = true end
classtable = {"barbarian","spirit champion","witch doctor","rift binder","journeyman"} if table.contains(classtable,primary) or table.contains(classtable,reborn) then xaos.class.barbarian = true end
classtable = {"thief","rake","assassin","disciple"} if table.contains(classtable,primary) or table.contains(classtable,reborn) then xaos.class.thief = true end
classtable = {"mage","invoker","illusionist","elementalist","mentalist","necromancer"} if table.contains(classtable,primary) or table.contains(classtable,reborn) then xaos.class.mage = true end

Trigger.name: Gear Sorting
Trigger.script:

itemwordcount =0
--echo (100*cur/max) if quality=="artifact" then --send("e;drop '" .. lastid .. ";w;clear") send("put '" .. lastid .. "' pink ") elseif quality=="epic" then if (100*cur/max) <= 60 then send("put '" .. lastid .. "' gold") else --send("drop '" .. lastid) --send("e;drop '" .. lastid .. ";w;clear") send("put '" .. lastid .. "' brown ") end elseif quality == "supreme" then if (100*cur/max) <= 60 then send("put '" .. lastid .. "' silver") else --send("e;d;drop '" .. lastid .. ";u;w;clear") send("put '" .. lastid .. "' maroon") end else send("put '" .. lastid .. "' sheer") end expandAlias("id " .. lastid) --tempTimer(3,function () expandAlias("id " .. lastid) end)

Trigger.name: Look an item!
Trigger.script:
--t local item = string.trim(multimatches[1][2])
if rex.match(item,[[A (?:\w*) backpack lies here]]) == nil then
item = rex.gsub(item,[[^(A |The )]],"") item = rex.gsub(item,[[lies here\.$]],"") item = rex.gsub(item,[[on the ground here\.$]],"") item = string.trim(item) --debugecho(item) local pattern = "(\\w*)" for i=1,itemwordcount do pattern= "(?:\\w*) " .. pattern end debugecho(pattern) item = rex.match(item,pattern) issorting = true debugecho(item) if item ~= nil and item ~= "" then send("clear") send("get all." .. item) expandAlias("id " .. item) end
end

Timer.name: DPS (burst) Calc + Display
Timer.script:
if combat then if dpsCount == nil then dpsCount = 0 end if dpsMem1 == nil then dpsMem1 = 0 end if dpsMem2 == nil then dpsMem2 = 0 end if dpsMem3 == nil then dpsMem3 = 0 end if dpsMem4 == nil then dpsMem4 = 0 end if dpsMem5 == nil then dpsMem5 = 0 --you deserve this for not learning tables, you whore end if dpsMem6 == nil then dpsMem6 = 0 end if dpsMem7 == nil then dpsMem7 = 0 end if dpsMem8 == nil then dpsMem8 = 0 end if dpsMem9 == nil then dpsMem9 = 0 end if dpsMem10 == nil then dpsMem10 = 0 end
if topDPS == nil then topDPS = 0 end if sustainedDPS == nil then sustainedDPS = 5 end if topSustainedDPS == nil then topSustainedDPS = 5 end if dpsCount > topDPS then topDPS = dpsCount end
--This calculates the average damage you output the last 11 rounds sustainedDPS = round( ( dpsMem1 + dpsMem2 + dpsMem3 + dpsMem4 + dpsMem5 + dpsMem6 + dpsMem7 + dpsMem8 + dpsMem9 + dpsMem10 + dpsCount ) / 11 )
if sustainedDPS > topSustainedDPS then topSustainedDPS = sustainedDPS end
dprBar:setValue(tonumber(sustainedDPS), tonumber(topSustainedDPS), tonumber(sustainedDPS)) dprBar.front:echo(sustainedDPS, nil, "c") dprUpperLeftMeter:echo(dpsCount) dprUpperRightMeter:echo(sustainedDPS)
if rrSpam and damageReport ~= 0 then cinsertText("You've done "..damageReport.." damage this round.\n") end
-- Buckets to save our stuff in dpsMem10 = dpsMem9 or 0 dpsMem9 = dpsMem8 or 0 dpsMem8 = dpsMem7 or 0 dpsMem7 = dpsMem6 or 0 dpsMem6 = dpsMem5 or 0 dpsMem5 = dpsMem4 or 0 dpsMem4 = dpsMem3 or 0 dpsMem3 = dpsMem2 or 0 dpsMem2 = dpsMem1 or 0 dpsMem1 = dpsCount
-- We end working with this round's DPS number, reset to zero dpsCount = 0 damageReport = 0 -- Finished with this round's value. Back to zero. -- end end

xpRateBar1:setValue(xpCollection1 + xpCollection2, topXPCollection, xpCollection1 + xpCollection2) xpRateBar2:setValue(xpCollection3 + xpCollection4, topXPCollection, xpCollection3 + xpCollection4) xpRateBar3:setValue(xpCollection5 + xpCollection6, topXPCollection, xpCollection5 + xpCollection6) xpRateBar4:setValue(xpCollection7 + xpCollection8, topXPCollection, xpCollection7 + xpCollection8) xpRateBar5:setValue(xpCollection9 + xpCollection10, topXPCollection, xpCollection9 + xpCollection10) xpRateBar6:setValue(xpCollection11 + xpCollection12, topXPCollection, xpCollection11 + xpCollection12)
xpCollection12 = xpCollection11 xpCollection11 = xpCollection10 xpCollection10 = xpCollection9 xpCollection9 = xpCollection8 xpCollection8 = xpCollection7 xpCollection7 = xpCollection6 xpCollection6 = xpCollection5 xpCollection5 = xpCollection4 xpCollection4 = xpCollection3 xpCollection3 = xpCollection2 xpCollection2 = xpCollection1 xpCollection1 = 0

Timer.name: Health Flow
Gold rate and kill rate
Timer.script:
-- Sum up the last minute of gold totalGold = (recentGold + goldBucket1 + goldBucket2)/3 totalKill = (killCount + killBucket1 + killBucket2 + killBucket3 + killBucket4 + killBucket5)/6 -- report that gold to the window
-- goldThing:Echo data from here
-- Store the values of gold into other buckets, for use next minute
cecho("goldDisplay","Gold/min "..round(totalGold).."\nKill/hour "..round(totalKill*60))
killBucket5 = killBucket4 killBucket4 = killBucket3 killBucket3 = killBucket2 killBucket2 = killBucket1 killBucket1 = totalKill goldBucket2 = goldBucket1 goldBucket1 = totalGold
-- Reset recentGold and restart the cycle recentGold = 0 killCount = 0
-- Do it for kill count

Alias.name: Auto Quest
Alias.script:
local questtocomplete = string.trim(matches[2])
if questtocomplete == "" then echo("Quests to complete\n") for k,v in pairs(xaos.quests) do echo(k .. ": " .. v.name .. " - " .. v.qm .. "\n") end elseif questtocomplete == "clear" then autoquest_clear() elseif tonumber(questtocomplete) ~= nil then for k,v in pairs(xaos.quests) do
if tonumber(k) == tonumber(questtocomplete) then autoquest_setquest(v.name) autoquest_go() break end end else
autoquest_setquest(questtocomplete) autoquest_go()
end

Alias.name: questfilter (\w*) (.*)
Alias.script:
local command = matches[2] local name = matches[3]
--debugecho(command) --debugecho(name)
if command == nil or command == "" then hecho("Available filters: qm, q") else command = string.lower(string.trim(command)) if command == "clear" then questfiltertype = "" questfiltername = "" else if command == "qm" then if name == nil or name == "" then for k,v in pairs(xaos.questmasters) do echo("[" .. k .. "]\t" .. v.name .. "\n") end else if tonumber(name) ~= nil then questfiltername = xaos.questmasters[tonumber(name)].name else questfiltername = string.trim(name) end questfiltertype = command
end end end
end

Alias.name: phunt
Alias.script:
send("bclear") prey=matches[2] huntTarget = tostring(matches[2]) killTarget = tostring(matches[2]) auto_hunt = true statusFollowing=false followTarget = ""
if not xaos.config.scripting.scan_mode then enableTimer("hunt listener") else disableTimer("hunt listener") send("scan") end disableTimer("scan listener")
send("auto ") auto_hunt = true xuicom( "You will attempt to automatically hunt something. Current settings indicate you're going to hunt " .. huntTarget ) xuicom("Currently, tracking "..wielded.." as your wielded weapon.") if statusFollowing then --This bit handles the "What do I do if I'm following someone?" question obsessionMode = true huntTarget = followTarget location = nil xuicom("You are following " .. followTarget .. " and this script will attempt to hunt them.") xuicom("Obsession mode is on by default. Use <white>obsessionoff<light_blue> to turn it off.
") cechoLink( "[ XUI ] <light_blue>Click here for more info on obsession mode.
", [[xuicom("Obsession mode inputs hunt aggressively in an attempt to keep up with the party leader.
")]], "obsession mode info", true ) if huntTarget then else variableCheck(huntTarget, "hunt location") auto_hunt = false end end combat = false hunting = false

huntTarget = tostring(matches[2]) killTarget = "" auto_hunt = true
statusFollowing=true
enableTimer("hunt listener") disableTimer("scan listener")
--send("auto ") auto_hunt = true xuicom( "You will attempt to automatically hunt something. Current settings indicate you're going to hunt " .. huntTarget ) xuicom("Currently, tracking "..wielded.." as your wielded weapon.") if statusFollowing then --This bit handles the "What do I do if I'm following someone?" question obsessionMode = true huntTarget = followTarget location = nil xuicom("You are following " .. followTarget .. " and this script will attempt to hunt them.") xuicom("Obsession mode is on by default. Use <white>obsessionoff<light_blue> to turn it off.\n") cechoLink( "[ XUI ] <light_blue>Click here for more info on obsession mode.\n", [[xuicom("Obsession mode inputs hunt aggressively in an attempt to keep up with the party leader.\n")]], "obsession mode info", true ) if huntTarget then else variableCheck(huntTarget, "hunt location") auto_hunt = false end end combat = false hunting = false

Alias.name: scanmode
Set Area
Alias.script:
local area = string.trim(matches[2])
local findmember = table.n_filter(xaos.areas,function (item) return item.name == area end)
if table.size(findmember) ~= 0 then
xaos.scripting.area = findmember[1] xaos.config.scripting.scan_mode = xaos.scripting.area.scanmode
echo(" Area set to: " .. xaos.scripting.area.name) else
for k,v in pairs(xaos.areas) do echo("\t" .. v.name .. "\n") end
end

if prey ~= nil and prey ~= "" then
expandAlias("cleararea")
expandAlias("phunt " .. prey)
else
if xaos.scripting.area.name ~= nil then expandAlias("phunt " .. xaos.scripting.area.keyword) else echo("\n\nNo Scripting Area has been set. Pass in a mobname to hunt or setarea\n\n") end
end

Alias.name: wearnormal

Alias.name: auto_hunt
Alias.script:
--deleteLine()
--Check if you're in combat or already hunting --If in combat, do nothing --If already hunting, do nothing --If neither in combat, nor hunting, hunt if not combat and not hunting and not restingMode then send("hunt "..huntTarget.."\n") hunting = true debugc("[ Debug ] <light_blue>auto_hunt is being invoked. Hunt target is "..huntTarget.."\n")
end
if current_mana < 50 and autoRest then restingMode = true end
if current_health > 90 and current_mana > 90 and restingMode then restingMode = false send("stand") end
if restingMode and not combat then send("cast renovi") send("sleep") end

Current settings indicate you're going to hunt " .. huntTarget ) xuicom("Currently, tracking "..wielded.." as your wielded weapon.") if statusFollowing then --This bit handles the "What do I do if I'm following someone?" question obsessionMode = true huntTarget = followTarget location = nil xuicom("You are following " .. followTarget .. " and this script will attempt to hunt them.") xuicom("Obsession mode is on by default. Use <white>obsessionoff<light_blue> to turn it off.

")]], "obsession mode info", true ) if huntTarget then else variableCheck(huntTarget, "hunt location") auto_hunt = false end end end combat = false hunting = false

Action.name: Change log
Action.script:
xuicom("Click a version number to see what was added.
") cechoLink( "0.1.3
", [[xuicom("Made the bar interface more readable.
Added warriors to autogain
Added thieves to autogain
Fixed a bug when hunting with no target
Added a settings check function in the toolbar. This should help you see what settings you have toggled until I figure out a better UI solution.
Selecting a script option will give the user more information
Fixed a bug that made auto renovi not auto renovi at all
Follow mode exists now. See the help menu for information on how to use
Class toggles refactored
Search mode has toggles now for fragments and money while auto hunting
Broadened the scope of chaos hunt script
Gave cleric auto healing a much needed refactoring
Gave thief trance a much needed refactoring
")]], "What was added in 0.1.3", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.6
", [[cecho("Added in a damage per round function. Should work out of the box.")]], "What was added in 0.1.6", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.7
", [[xuicom("Fixed it so auto should only be an alias when used at the start of a aline.
Added a quick and dirty resolve hack for barbarian.
Added fire widows and vicious driders to the hunting lists.")]], "What was added in 0.1.7", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.8
", [[xuicom("Cleaned up autofollow features. Should work more consistently.
Extended the sustained DPR range to about 11 rounds. Should better reflect damage over time in terms of rounds.
Rounded numbers in the DPR meter.
Added an experience rate measurement.
Fixed a bug with customHunt that made it never work.XP Bar no longer shoots to the moon when you're over 100%. Now displays current non>100 value and all the saved up dings.")]], "What was added in 0.1.8", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.11
", [[xuicom("Changed the incoming damager meter for the damage inertia function. This function will give you an at a glance way to tell if you're taking damage, or healing, and how much damage or healing you're receiving.
Added a scroll skillup utility. Activate it and buy and recite a scroll at the Viridian Spider.
Fixed some OOC patterns.
Added an enchantment refactoring utility. Activate it to retrieve the appropriate syntax.")]], "What was added in 0.1.11", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.12
", [[xuicom("Made the scaling in the XUI condition flow meter smoother. I accidentally tied it's rate of change to prompt instead of time.")]], "What was added in 0.1.12", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.13
", [[xuicom("Fixed some things with the condition flow bar, broke some other things. Fuck.")]], "What was added in 0.1.13", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.14
", [[xuicom("Added yeti undead to swamps rotation
Auto heal now actual works
Auto renovi should work without having to cast it first now.
Auto trance will now recognize that it's fallen if someone knocks it off of you.
A chat size customization has been added.
Chat timestamp toggle added.
You can now customize the delay on hunt in the autohunt script.
Refactored chat features (Mostly just for me)")]], "What was added in 0.1.14", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.15
", [[xuicom("This changelog is now actually accessible.
Fixed an issue where gtell was logged twice.
Extended full chat features to some that missed it.
Fixed the auto rearming function.
Should no longer attempt to auto heal when that feature isn't selected.")]], "What was added in 0.1.15", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.16
", [[xuicom("Auto dividing will for mentalists.
Cooldown on auto reply to tells.
Auto drink added. Four different options.
Auto trance refactored. Should spam trance less, but spam auto trance more.")]], "What was added in 0.1.16", true ) cechoLink( "0.1.17
", [[xuicom("New <white>XP wave<light_blue> should help you visualize your XP flow. Each column is 10 minutes worth of data.")]], "What was added in 0.1.17", true )
cechoLink( "0.1.19
", [[xuicom("Bclear should now only trigger if you're in the auto script.
Added a warcry management function for knights/berserkers.
Cleaned up after myself in some backend stuff.
Automated proceed is now under QOL Auto.
Cleaned up gnolls scripting targets.
Cleaned up upper swamps scripting targets.
Cleaned up lower swamps scripting targets.
Hooded jerks now captured in gtell.
The OOC window will now update it's position in a lot more instances than before, meaning you can resize your window and OOC and it will update a new relative position.
New condition bar added. Should make combat more readable. Can be deactivated in XUI menu.
Generalized auto healing so you can now use heal, mass healing, mend, whatever.
DetermThreshold is a thing now.
Guerilla mode added for Guarng. Experimental, tempermental.
When in auto scripting mode, the script will now stop and try to rest if your mana falls below a certain threshold.")]], "What was added in 0.1.19", true )

Action.name: Aggressive follow
Action.script: xuicom("Just follow someone with the command <white>follow<light_blue> (make sure it's fully typed out) and then select autohunt.")

Action.name: disarm protection
Action.script: xuicom("XUI comes with built in disarm protection. It will first attempt to rewield immediately after being disarmed, if you don't immediately rewield it, it will continue to attempt to wield a weapon every round until successful.") xuicom("To initialize this feature use <white>wield (arg)<light_blue>, being more specific using apostraphes is recommended so you will rewield precisely what you intend when disarmed.")

Action.name: Group of purple columns.
Action.script:
xuicom("This is the experience wave utility, intended to allow you to track your XP rate in an intuitive and visual way. Starting from the right, the XP wave function will begin to fill out as you kill, relative to the highest rate you've achieved. Each column is a 10 minute period of data, and overall all 6 columns track an hours worth of data.")
xuicom("In short, each column is 10 minutes and represents the % of xp per level you got.")

Action.name: Output box
Action.script: xuicom("Under output: Last round tracks your last 3 seconds worth of damage information. Over time tracks the last 33 seconds worth of data on average. It attempts to only track what's happening in combat, but the data in this area may be dialed down by the amount of time you spend moving towards your target not doing any damage") xuicom("Incoming: This is the condition flow utility. It tracks the last few rounds worth of data and reports back the relative change in your character's condition. Small and red means you, overall, took a small bit of damage. Small and green means that regardless of what happened in the last few rounds, overall you healed by a little. Black is neutral. Consider hero recalling if this bar is big and red.")

Action.name: Spacing
Action.script:
if spacing then spacing = false cecho("<light_blue>[ XUI Settings ] Spacing in the miniconsole for chat will now be single.") else spacing = true cecho("<light_blue>[ XUI Settings ] Spacing in the miniconsole for chat will now be double.") end
createChatConsole()

Action.name: Gag chat input
Action.script:
if gagging then gagging = false cecho("<light_blue>You will now see chat input directly to the MUD.") else gagging = true cecho("<light_blue>Chat input will only be shown in the miniconsole.") end
createChatConsole()

Action.name: Larger
Action.script:
if chatFontSize == nil then chatFontSize = 8 end chatFontSize = (chatFontSize + 1) cecho("OOC","[ XUI ] <light_blue>Font size set to "..chatFontSize.."\n")
createChatConsole()

Action.name: Smaller
Action.script:
if chatFontSize == nil then chatFontSize = 8 end
if chatFontSize > 6 then chatFontSize = (chatFontSize - 1) cecho("OOC","[ XUI ] <light_blue>Font size set to "..chatFontSize.."\n") end
createChatConsole()

Action.name: Timestamps
Action.script:
useTimeStamps = variableToggle (useTimeStamps, "Nothing", "Time stamps will no longer appear in the chat window.", "Time stamps for the chat window activated." )
createChatConsole()

Action.script:
chatWidth = chatWidth + 100
createChatConsole()

Action.name: Thinner

createChatConsole()

Action.name: Toggle
Action.script:

Current settings indicate you're going to hunt " .. huntTarget ) xuicom("Currently, tracking "..wielded.." as your wielded weapon.") if statusFollowing then --This bit handles the "What do I do if I'm following someone?" question obsessionMode = true huntTarget = followTarget location = nil xuicom("You are following " .. followTarget .. " and this script will attempt to hunt them.") xuicom("Obsession mode is on by default. Use <white>obsessionoff<light_blue> to turn it off.
") cechoLink( "[ XUI ] <light_blue>Click here for more info on obsession mode.
", [[xuicom("Obsession mode inputs hunt aggressively in an attempt to keep up with the party leader.
")]], "obsession mode info", true ) if huntTarget then else variableCheck(huntTarget, "hunt location") auto_hunt = false end end end combat = false hunting = false

It will also prime some variables for use in the autohunt feature.") xuicom("To use it in an area, or for a purpose not covered in the hunt location list, the following commands may be helpful.") xuicom("<white>customHunt:<gray> This will allow you to configure the hunt target for autohunt manually.") xuicom("<white>customKill:<gray> Using this will change the output on the (kill target) commands that come up. This keyword should be more general.")

Script.name: GenerateVariables
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function generatevariables() if autoLoot == nil then autoLoot = "" end if autoPickup == nil then autoPickup = "" end if autoDeathAction == nil then autoDeathAction = "" end
if auto_questTurnIn == nil then auto_questTurnIn = "" end if questmaster == nil then questmaster = "unknown" end if questTurnIn == nil then questTurnIn = "" end
if questfiltertype == nil then questfiltertype = "" end if questfiltername == nil then questfiltername = "" end
if xpcollector == nill then xpcollector = {} end
if xaos == nil then xaos = {} end --if quests == nil then quests = {} end
if autoquesting == nil then autoquesting = "" end if xaos.autoquest == nil then xaos.autoquest = {} end if xaos.autoquest.auto == nil then xaos.autoquest.auto = "" end if xaos.autoquest.autoquest_currentquest == nil then xaos.autoquest.autoquest_currentquest = "" end if xaos.backpack == nil then xaos.backpack = "" end if xaos.buffs == nil then xaos.buffs = {} end if xaos.class == nil then xaos.class = {} end if xaos.currency == nil then xaos.currency = {} end if xaos.currentequip == nil then xaos.currentequip = {} end if xaos.fightingstyle == nil then xaos.fightingstyle = "" end if xaos.Level == nil then xaos.Level = "" end if xaos.LevelPercent == nil then xaos.LevelPercent = "" end if xaos.tactics == nil then xaos.tactics = "" end

Script.name: Quest Functions
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function fixstring(text)
--echodebug(text) text = string.gsub(text,"'","") --echodebug(text) text = string.gsub(text,"\"","") --echodebug(text) text = string.gsub(text,"-"," ") return text end
function quest_getqmquests(qmname) qmname = string.trim(qmname) local qtable = table.n_filter(xaos.quests, function(item) return item.qm == qmname end ) return qtable end
function quest_getcompletedqm(qmname) qmname = string.trim(qmname) local qtable = table.n_filter(xaos.quests, function(item) if item.qm ~= qmname then return false end local otable = table.n_filter(item.objectives, function (oitem) return not oitem.complete end ) return table.size(otable) == 0 end ) debugecho("getcomp" .. table.size(qtable)) return qtable end
function quest_getcomplete() local qtable = table.n_filter(xaos.quests, function(item)
local otable = table.n_filter(item.objectives, function (oitem) return not oitem.complete end ) return table.size(otable) == 0 end ) --debugecho("getcomp" .. table.size(qtable)) return qtable end
function quest_iscomplete(questname) local filteredquests = quest_getcomplete() local qtable = table.n_filter(filteredquests, function(item) return fixstring(item.name) == fixstring(questname) end ) --debugecho("getiscomp" .. table.size(qtable)) return table.size(qtable) ~= 0 end
function autoquest_clear() xaos.autoquest.autoquest_currentquest="" end function autoquest_setquest(questname) echo("Auto Quest Set " .. questname) if xaos.autoquest == nil then xaos.autoquest = {} end xaos.autoquest.autoquest_currentquest=string.trim(questname) killTarget = quest_getkilllist(string.trim(questname)) end function autoquest_switchtargets() local questname = xaos.autoquest.autoquest_currentquest killTarget = quest_getkilllist(string.trim(questname)) local whotohunt = quest_gettarget(questname) if whotohunt ~= nil then expandAlias("ahunt " .. whotohunt) end end function autoquest_go() local questname = xaos.autoquest.autoquest_currentquest
killTarget = quest_getkilllist(questname) --echo(1) local whotohunt = quest_gettarget(questname) --echo(2) --echo("go") --echo(whotohunt)
if whotohunt ~= nil then enableTimer("hunt listener") expandAlias("ahunt " .. whotohunt) else cecho("data","[ Quest ] " .. questname .. ": Objectives Met\n") auto_hunt=false autoquesting=false xaos.autoquest.autoquest_currentquest="" end end function quest_gettarget(questname) --local questname = xaos.autoquest.autoquest_currentquest --autoquesting=true --killTarget = quest_getkilllist(string.trim(questname)) --local foundnexttarget=false for key,value in pairs(xaos.quests) do if value.name==questname then --echo("Found quest") local objlist = {} for okey,ovalue in pairs(value.objectives) do if not ovalue.complete and ovalue.kill then table.insert(objlist,string.trim(ovalue.name)) end end if table.size(objlist) > 0 then
local which = math.random(#objlist) echo(table.size(objlist)) return objlist[which]
else
return nil
end break --table.insert(xaos.quests[key].objectives,{name=matches[3],complete=(matches[2]=="X")})
end end end
function quest_updateobjective(objective,amount) local objectiveset = false local obj = tostring(rex.match(string.trim(objective), [[(?:[aA]n|[aA]|[tT]he)?(?:\s)?([^\(].*)]])) for key,value in pairs(xaos.quests) do --if value.name==questname then for okey,ovalue in pairs(value.objectives) do --echo(tostring(rex.match(ovalue.name, [[(?:[0-9]+x)?(?:\s)?(?:[aA]|[tT]he)?([^\(].*)\(]]))) --if not ovalue.complete then
local target = tostring(rex.match(string.trim(ovalue.name), [[(?:[aA]n|[aA]|[tT]he)?(?:\s)?([^\(].*)]]))
if string.trim(obj) == string.trim(target) then xaos.quests[key].objectives[okey].current = tonumber(xaos.quests[key].objectives[okey].current)+tonumber(amount) objectiveset = true break end end --end if objectiveset then break end end end
function quest_getkilllist(questtofind) local retlist = "" for key,value in pairs(xaos.quests) do if value.name==questtofind then --echo("Found quest") for okey,ovalue in pairs(value.objectives) do if not ovalue.complete and ovalue.kill then if string.len(retlist)>0 then retlist = fixstring(retlist) .. "," end local curtar = string.gsub(string.trim(ovalue.name)," of "," ") retlist = retlist .. curtar end end break end end return retlist end
function quest_completeobjective(objective) local objectiveset = false local obj = tostring(rex.match(string.trim(objective), [[(?:[aA]n|[aA]|[tT]he)?(?:\s)?([^\(].*)]])) for key,value in pairs(xaos.quests) do --if value.name==questname then for okey,ovalue in pairs(value.objectives) do --echo(tostring(rex.match(ovalue.name, [[(?:[0-9]+x)?(?:\s)?(?:[aA]|[tT]he)?([^\(].*)\(]]))) --if not ovalue.complete then
local target = tostring(rex.match(string.trim(ovalue.name), [[(?:[aA]n|[aA]|[tT]he)?(?:\s)?([^\(].*)]]))
if string.trim(obj) == string.trim(target) then xaos.quests[key].objectives[okey].complete=true objectiveset = true break end end --end if objectiveset then break end end end
function QMContains(qm) local function checkQMName(item) return (string.find(qm,item.lookup) ~= nil) end local entrieList = table.n_filter(xaos.questmasters, checkQMName) return table.size(entrieList)~=0 end
function QMGetName(qm) local function checkQMName(item) return (string.find(qm,item.lookup) ~= nil) end local entrieList = table.n_filter(xaos.questmasters, checkQMName) return entrieList[1].name end

Script.name: Script Helpers
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function debugecho(text) if xaos.config.debugmode then cecho("data","[DE " .. getTime(true,"HH.mm.ss") .. "] " ..text .. "\n") end end
function calcAscendTime(lvl,lvlpercent) lvl = lvl % 100 lvl = lvl -1 local curascdings = lvl*((2+(lvl*2))/2) local nextascdings = (lvl+1)*((2+((lvl+1)*2))/2)
local curdings = curascdings + ((nextascdings-curascdings)*(lvlpercent/100)) local leftdings = 9900-curdings leftdings = leftdings * 100 --debugecho(leftdings) local firstindex = table.size(xpcollector) local lastindex = firstindex-11 if lastindex <= 0 then lastindex = 1 end if firstindex == lastindex then return "unknown" end local total = 0 for k=firstindex,lastindex,-1 do total = total + xpcollector[k].xp end --Average total = total / (firstindex - lastindex) --debugecho(total) --Down to minute chunks total = total / 5 --debugecho(total) total = leftdings/total --debugecho(total)
totalstring = "" --if (total/1440) > 0 then totalstring = totalstring .. math.floor(total/1440) .. " days, " total = total % 1440 --end --if (total/60) > 0 then totalstring = totalstring .. math.floor(total/60) .. " hours, " total = total % 60 --end totalstring = totalstring .. string.format("%4.2f",total) .. " minutes." return totalstring end
function calcAscendPercent(level, levelPercent) level = tonumber(level)%100 levelPercent = tonumber(levelPercent)
level = level - 1 nextlevel = level+1
local curasc = level*((2+(level*2))/2)/9900 local nextasc = nextlevel*((2+(nextlevel*2))/2)/9900
return 100*(curasc+((nextasc-curasc)*(levelPercent/100)))
--return 100*(levelratio[(level%100)]+((levelratio[(level%100)+1]-levelratio[(level%100)])*(tonumber(levelPercent)/100))) end
function updateXPbars()
local firstindex = table.size(xpcollector) local lastindex = firstindex-15 if lastindex <= 0 then lastindex = 1 end local index = 1
for k=firstindex,lastindex,-1 do local tmpxp = xpcollector[k].xp if tmpxp == 0 then tmpxp = 1 end xpRateBars[index]:setValue(tmpxp,topXPCollection,xpcollector[k].xp) index=index+1 end
end
function oldcalcAscendPercent(level, levelPercent) level = tonumber(level) levelPercent = tonumber(levelPercent)
return 100*(levelratio[(level%100)]+((levelratio[(level%100)+1]-levelratio[(level%100)])*(tonumber(levelPercent)/100))) end
function updatestats() expandAlias("questeat") send("score") send("aff") send("style") send("tactics") end
function helpheadecho(text) hecho("main","#c0FFFF\n" .. text .. "\n") end
function helpbodyecho(text) hecho("main","#c0FFFF " .. text .. "\n") end
function helpdescecho(text) hecho("main"," " .. text .. "\n") end

Script.name: UI Stuff
Experience rate visualization
Party Lavel
deleteOldProfiles script
Script.script:
function deleteOldProfiles(keepdays_arg, delete_maps)
--[[ Deletes old profiles/maps in the "current"/"map" folders of the Mudlet home directory. The following files are NOT deleted: - Files newer than the amount of days specified as an argument to deleteOldProfiles(), or 31 days if not specified. - One file for every month before that. Specifically: The first available file of every month prior to this. Setting the second argument to true will delete maps instead of profiles. (e.g. deleteOldProfiles(10, true)) --]]
local keepdays = tonumber(keepdays_arg) or 31 local profile_table = {} local used_last_mod_months = {} local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local dirpath = getMudletHomeDir()..slash..(delete_maps and "map" or "current") local delnum = 0
-- Traverse the profiles folder and create a table of files: for filename in lfs.dir(dirpath) do if filename~="." and filename~=".." then profile_table[#profile_table+1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(dirpath..slash..filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort the table according to last modification date from old to new: table.sort(profile_table, function (a,b) return a.last_mod < b.last_mod end)
echo(string.format("\nDeleting old %s. Files newer than %d days and one profile for every month before that will be kept.", delete_maps and "maps" or "profiles", keepdays)) for i,v in ipairs(profile_table) do local days = math.floor(os.difftime(os.time(), v.last_mod)/86400) local last_mod_month = os.date("%Y/%m", v.last_mod) if days > keepdays then -- For profiles older than X days, check if we already kept a table for this month: if not table.contains(used_last_mod_months, last_mod_month) then -- If not, do nothing and mark this month as "kept". used_last_mod_months[#used_last_mod_months+1] = last_mod_month else -- Otherwise remove the file: local success, errorstring = os.remove(dirpath..slash..v.name) if success then delnum = delnum + 1 else cecho("\n<red>ERROR: "..errorstring) end end end end echo(string.format("\nDeletion complete. %d/%d files were removed successfully.", delnum, #profile_table)) end

Class check function
Script.script:
function classToggle (class, name)
if class then xuicom("The settings for the class "..name.." will no longer apply to you.") return false else xuicom("The UI will now let script features specifically meant for "..name.." to work.") return true
end end
function variableToggle (var, name, off, on ) if var == nil then var = false end if var then xuicom(off) return false else xuicom(on) return true
end end
function variableCheck (variable, name) if not variable then xuicom("This feature works with ["..name.."] which is not currently activated.") end end
function round(num, numDecimalPlaces) local mult = 10^(numDecimalPlaces or 0) return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult end

killBucket2 or 0 killBucket3 = killBucket3 or 0 killBucket4 = killBucket4 or 0 killBucket5 = killBucket5 or 0 killTarget = killTarget or "helpful bob" determThresh = 0 if inputAttack == nil then statusDisarm = statusDisarm or false -- Following variables if statusFollow == nil then statusFollow = false end following = following or "no one" topXPCollection = topXPCollection or 0 xpCollection12 Script.name: loadEnchantmentPackage
Script.script: ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- tempTimer(4,[[useGostEnchant=0]]) tempTimer(5,[[raiseEvent("layer1")]])

Script.name: ResetWindowsOnLoad
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function resetWindows()
for k,v in pairs(menu.tabs) do menu[menu.tabs[k]]:show() menu[menu.tabs[k]]:hide() end menu[menu.current]:show()
end
resetWindows()

Script.name: LoadDamageCalcs
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- if RoundCalc == nil then RoundCalc = { mine = {hit=0,damage=0,block=0,dodge=0,parry=0,miss=0,reflect=0,phase=0,}, opp = {hit=0,damage=0,block=0,dodge=0,parry=0,miss=0,reflect=0,phase=0,}, } end if TotalCalc == nil then TotalCalc = {count=0, mine = {hit=0,damage=0,block=0,dodge=0,parry=0,miss=0,reflect=0,phase=0,}, opp = {hit=0,damage=0,block=0,dodge=0,parry=0,miss=0,reflect=0,phase=0,}, } end if scenario_round_count == nil then scenario_round_count = 0 end if DamageScenarios == nil then DamageScenarios = {} end
function totalhit(mine,opp) return mine.hit+opp.block+opp.dodge+opp.parry+opp.miss+opp.reflect+opp.phase end
function scenarioDisplay(index) return DamageScenarios[index].name .. "\n" .. damageDisplay(DamageScenarios[index].data) end
function damageDisplay(data) local toreturn = ""
local function getDef(sub,opp) local subreturn = "<grey>" subreturn = subreturn .. " Dodge : " .. string.format("%5.2f",100*(sub.dodge / totalhit(opp,sub))) .. "% - " .. sub.dodge .. "\n" subreturn = subreturn .. " Parry : " .. string.format("%5.2f",100*(sub.parry / totalhit(opp,sub))) .. "% - " .. sub.parry .. "\n" subreturn = subreturn .. " Block : " .. string.format("%5.2f",100*(sub.block / totalhit(opp,sub))) .. "% - " .. sub.block .. "\n" subreturn = subreturn .. " Phase : " .. string.format("%5.2f",100*(sub.phase / totalhit(opp,sub))) .. "% - " .. sub.phase .. "\n" subreturn = subreturn .. " Reflect: " .. string.format("%5.2f",100*(sub.reflect / totalhit(opp,sub))) .. "% - " .. sub.reflect .. "\n" subreturn = subreturn .. " Miss : " .. string.format("%5.2f",100*(sub.miss / totalhit(opp,sub))) .. "% - " .. sub.miss .. "\n" subreturn = subreturn .. " Hit : " .. string.format("%5.2f",100*(opp.hit / totalhit(opp,sub))) .. "% - " .. opp.hit .. "\n" subreturn = subreturn .. totalhit(opp,sub) .. "\n" return subreturn end toreturn = toreturn .."\n<white>Defenses Per Round\n" toreturn = toreturn ..getDef(data.mine,data.opp) toreturn = toreturn .."<white>Offense Per Round\n" toreturn = toreturn ..getDef(data.opp,data.mine) toreturn = toreturn .. "Dam In /Rd : " ..string.format("%5.3f",(data.opp.damage / data.count)) .. "\n" toreturn = toreturn .. "Dam Out /Rd : " ..string.format("%5.3f",(data.mine.damage / data.count)) .. "\n" toreturn = toreturn .."<white>Rounds - " .. data.count .. "\n"
return toreturn end
function getScenario(name)
end
function TotalCalc.Combine(rnd) TotalCalc.mine.hit=TotalCalc.mine.hit+rnd.mine.hit TotalCalc.mine.damage=TotalCalc.mine.damage+rnd.mine.damage TotalCalc.mine.block=TotalCalc.mine.block+rnd.mine.block TotalCalc.mine.dodge=TotalCalc.mine.dodge+rnd.mine.dodge TotalCalc.mine.parry=TotalCalc.mine.parry+rnd.mine.parry TotalCalc.mine.miss=TotalCalc.mine.miss+rnd.mine.miss TotalCalc.mine.reflect=TotalCalc.mine.reflect+rnd.mine.reflect TotalCalc.mine.phase=TotalCalc.mine.phase+rnd.mine.phase
TotalCalc.opp.hit=TotalCalc.opp.hit+rnd.opp.hit TotalCalc.opp.damage=TotalCalc.opp.damage+rnd.opp.damage TotalCalc.opp.block=TotalCalc.opp.block+rnd.opp.block TotalCalc.opp.dodge=TotalCalc.opp.dodge+rnd.opp.dodge TotalCalc.opp.parry=TotalCalc.opp.parry+rnd.opp.parry TotalCalc.opp.miss=TotalCalc.opp.miss+rnd.opp.miss TotalCalc.opp.reflect=TotalCalc.opp.reflect+rnd.opp.reflect TotalCalc.opp.phase=TotalCalc.opp.phase+rnd.opp.phase
TotalCalc.count=TotalCalc.count+1
if scenario_round_count == TotalCalc.count then expandAlias("FinishScenario " .. scenario_name) end end
function TotalCalc.Clear() TotalCalc.mine.hit=0 TotalCalc.mine.damage=0 TotalCalc.mine.block=0 TotalCalc.mine.dodge=0 TotalCalc.mine.parry=0 TotalCalc.mine.miss=0 TotalCalc.mine.reflect=0 TotalCalc.mine.phase=0
TotalCalc.opp.hit=0 TotalCalc.opp.damage=0 TotalCalc.opp.block=0 TotalCalc.opp.dodge=0 TotalCalc.opp.parry=0 TotalCalc.opp.miss=0 TotalCalc.opp.reflect=0 TotalCalc.opp.phase=0
TotalCalc.count=0 end
function RoundCalc.Clear() RoundCalc.mine.hit=0 RoundCalc.mine.damage=0 RoundCalc.mine.block=0 RoundCalc.mine.dodge=0 RoundCalc.mine.parry=0 RoundCalc.mine.miss=0 RoundCalc.mine.reflect=0 RoundCalc.mine.phase=0
RoundCalc.opp.hit=0 RoundCalc.opp.damage=0 RoundCalc.opp.block=0 RoundCalc.opp.dodge=0 RoundCalc.opp.parry=0 RoundCalc.opp.miss=0 RoundCalc.opp.reflect=0 RoundCalc.opp.phase=0 end

Key.name: F2 - Tab
Key.script: for k,v in pairs(menu.tabs) do menu[v]:hide() end menu[menu.tabs[1]]:show()

Key.name: F12 - Toggle Scripting
Key.script:
huntTarget = huntTarget or "Helpful Bob" if auto_hunt then auto_hunt = false xuicom("You will no longer attempt to automatically hunt targets") else send("auto ") auto_hunt = true xuicom( "You will attempt to automatically hunt something. Current settings indicate you're going to hunt " .. huntTarget ) xuicom("Currently, tracking "..wielded.." as your wielded weapon.") if statusFollowing then --This bit handles the "What do I do if I'm following someone?" question obsessionMode = true huntTarget = followTarget location = nil xuicom("You are following " .. followTarget .. " and this script will attempt to hunt them.") xuicom("Obsession mode is on by default. Use <white>obsessionoff<light_blue> to turn it off.
") cechoLink( "[ XUI ] <light_blue>Click here for more info on obsession mode.
", [[xuicom("Obsession mode inputs hunt aggressively in an attempt to keep up with the party leader.
")]], "obsession mode info", true ) if huntTarget then else variableCheck(huntTarget, "hunt location") auto_hunt = false end end end combat = false hunting = false
